channel.title: Client RUN error - Fixed
channel.description:
Ohh nevermind, i'm an idiot.
[hr]
[s]It gives me this error when I try to run it.
Error; [code]Error: Signlink:178 Signlink:426 Screen:560 client:363 | java.lang.RuntimeException [/code]
Batch file; [code]@echo off title Run cd bin java -Xmx1024m client 2 live live lowmem members english game0 pause[/code][/s]
